quest.name: Nhaama's Sweet Embrace
journal: The Dotharli youth is looking for someone to protect her.
objectives: Speak with the Dotharli youth and slay any enemies that appear.
Speak with the Dotharli youth and slay any enemies that appear.

dialogue.name: FANATIC02790
dialogue.text: Hello there, traveler. I would appreciate your help, should you have the time.

dialogue.name: FANATIC02790
dialogue.text: However, I would prefer to discuss it somewhere free from prying eyes. Meet me in front of the Dusk Throne.

dialogue.name: FANATIC02790
dialogue.text: Thank you for coming. I wish to go to meet with Nhaama. But the road to her is fraught with peril. As such, I need someone to protect me.

dialogue.name: FANATIC02790
dialogue.text: It was only a few weeks ago that both my mother and father were taken from me by the heartless Oronir.

dialogue.name: FANATIC02790
dialogue.text: Their deaths made me realize that I must commune with the Dusk Mother. I shall pray that she strike down those who pretend they are the children of Azim, and that she continue to nurture the Dotharl.

dialogue.name: FANATIC02790
dialogue.text: Nhaama resides in the House of the Crooked Coin to the north. I have heard many tales recently of pilgrims being slain by the monsters that lie in wait along the trail.

dialogue.name: FANATIC02790
dialogue.text: The same must not happen to me. Please, be on your guard. Rendezvous with me further to the north.

dialogue.name: FANATIC02790
dialogue.text: The Dusk Mother awaits. Let us make haste.

dialogue.name: FANATIC02790
dialogue.text: It seems the tales I heard were true. Dispatch them swiftly!

dialogue.name: FANATIC02790
dialogue.text: Thank you. Let us resume the climb.

dialogue.name: FANATIC02790
dialogue.text: More beasts. There is no other way to reach Nhaama. We must not falter!

dialogue.name: FANATIC02790
dialogue.text: We are close now. So very close...

dialogue.name: FANATIC02790
dialogue.text: Thank you for seeing me here safely. There is one last thing I would request of you.

dialogue.name: FANATIC02790
dialogue.text: Deliver this to a girl in Dotharl Khaa named Maral.

dialogue.name: FANATIC02790
dialogue.text: Now, please leave me to be alone with the Dusk Mother.

dialogue.name: MARAL
dialogue.text: Is there something you wish to say to me?

dialogue.name: MARAL
dialogue.text: A letter? But, why?

dialogue.name: MARAL
dialogue.text: So she has gone to be one with the Dusk Mother. I have no doubt it is what she wanted, but that knowledge does naught to alleviate the pain in my heart.

dialogue.name: MARAL
dialogue.text: The House contains a crystalâ”€a sliver of Nhaama's essence. Those who wish to rejoin with the Dusk Mother throw themselves down into the cavern there. This breaks the cycle of reincarnation.

dialogue.name: MARAL
dialogue.text: The Dusk Mother has always been at the center of my friend's life. The same was true of her previous incarnations.

dialogue.name: MARAL
dialogue.text: To think, if she had been killed together with her family, her spirit could have moved into the child my sister is about to birth...

dialogue.name: MARAL
dialogue.text: Forget what I just said. I did not mean it. We should take solace in the knowledge that she is finally at peace.

dialogue.name: MARAL
dialogue.text: The envelope her letter came in also contained what seems to be your compensation for helping her. Please accept it as a token of her gratitude.
